attribute_guidelines.description: If designed to be used during a specific type of year, the appropriate season this item may be used.
The predominant text displayed on an item. Not intended to necessarily be inclusive of every single word that is present on the product.
The style of jackets available, such as Bomber, Cardigan, Denim, etc.
The style of skirts available, such as A-Frame, Bubble, Flare, etc.

summary: The page outlines additional attributes for Baby Layette & Gift Sets, including specifics on Diaper Size, Season, Text, Jacket Style, and Skirt Style. Each attribute includes a description and examples where relevant.
